citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3 pm on
28-Jun-19.
Rang doorbell with no answer, twice. Called contact phone number and left message, waited thirty minutes. No
one arrived home or returned my call within that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3 pm on
28-Jun-19.
Rang doorbell with no answer, twice.  Called contact phone number and left message, waited thirty minutes.  No
one arrived home or returned my call within that time.
